nodes.text: Hoth: Under the Ice, Part 1: Snowflake Base
Hoth: Under the Ice, Part 1: Snowflake Base is an article written by Cory J. Herndon, and published by Wizards of the Coast on December 4, 2003.
In this tale, smugglers led by Jonox Forb make the fatal mistake of thinking they've found the perfect hideout.
